DOC.brief_summary: The purpose trial determine whether Ipilimumab prolong survival compare Pemetrexed subject nonsquamous , non-small cell lung cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Trial Ipilimumab Versus Pemetrexed Non-Squamous Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
